entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
